page.title: 05MEDIA
page.content: Because of the isolated location of many households have{television}and {radio.}Few black-and-white televisions remain, and some houses have more than one television set. Some televisions serve as monitors for home{computers which have become popular in recent years. Also some households possess video tape recorders though, being available only recently, these appliances are not yet universal. Daily newspapers and periodical magazines can be purchased from the little shop in Rhyd_y_croesau, though a larger selection is available at newsagents in Oswestry. The local newspaper is the well established {"Oswestry and Border Counties {Advertizer"}which covers the main news and events of the area. Its editorial offices are in Oswestry and microfilm of past issues is kept in the library.
